short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable reading mode in most popular documentation websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ultimate reading mode for developers and students - a chrome extension that helps you focus and stay on track while reading 
documentation online. This extension will change the aspect of the most popular websites that provide web development learning resources, such as W3schools.com and MDN Web Docs.
